extendedInfo.description: Live Race Results with live chat and twitter feeds.  This ULTIMATE EDITION puts in your hands the results of every NASCAR race ever run (since 1949, the emergence of NASCAR). NOW WITH NATIONWIDE RESULTS (AND AUDIO)!!Results from: Every Race; Every Driver; Every Track! Features Include: â¢ LIVE race updates within 1-2 minutes of the real action â¢ Listen to Live Race Audioâ¢ Follow Live Twitter Feeds with race updatesâ¢ View cup standings with detailed categories such as top5,top10, pole lapsled and more. â¢ Review newsfeeds from all over to get the latest and greatest from this great sport. â¢ Archived race results from every nascar race ever run. View each year or each track or each driver. â¢ Complete driver histories with even breakdowns by individual years and track performances. This app gives you the complete NASCAR experience. Nowhere in any app or website will you find this compilation of results. Look up any race and result. Answer all those trivia questions and compare drivers. There is no other resource like this on any other app or even the internet itself. *This APP was developed by FanStar Sports and has no affiliation with Nascar or Sprint Series. The terms used here are as descriptors and in no way associate FanStar with their rightful copyright holders.**This APP has the same information as our TOTAL NASCAR app, please do not download both as one will get you the same information.

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Confused by other comments. If you can\'t watch the race & don\'t have sprint service this is the best app to have. I have had no problems listening to the races. You listen to MRN radio broadcast. Worth the money stop searching for the right app you just found it!
reviews.author: Tanya Holcomb

reviews.title: Crashes too often on nexus 7
reviews.comment: Not happy about a great tablet and a app that won\'t run without crashing all the time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad bad
reviews.comment: Does not work for this race in datona wtf
reviews.author: Lionel Hirsch

reviews.title: 2012 no 2013
reviews.comment: How do I get too 2013 schedual and standings. Its stuck on 2012
reviews.author: Ray Weaver

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Not sure what it\'s supposed to do but so far it does nothing!
reviews.author: Danny Carlile

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: Befor the update you could see updated position now you cant. There is no live audio or live video. Im glad I didnt pay for it and am now uninstalling it. Dont say you have features that you dont. I would give it 5 negative stars if I could
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incomplete App
reviews.comment: Much of the data isn\'t updated/shown (laps led, etc.). Not intuitive to use/navigate. Should be free until basics are addressed. Looks like most time was spent making it \"pretty\" versus functional.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: You make an update to make it look better but it is even more useless than it was before. Downgrading from two to one stars. Terrible app. Not even worth downloading if its free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: cant believe i payed for this app. I wanted it for the audio but it never works
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hmmm
reviews.comment: Guys, if your going make a mobile app, make the content (videos ect) mobile able. Also a leaderboard tab would be nice. Also,  in the schedule, what channel i can enjoy my favorite sport on the planet. A track position, like the original app, would b primo too. Im not at home to enjoy every race, and on the go was primo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Great app, but crashes every time you click on Joe Nemechek\'s name. Coincidence or not?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Idk what to think of this app anymore! Purchased it last season... :/\nWhat happened? Tried to pick favorite driver, but it won\'t let me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad!
reviews.comment: Actually, this app works just fine on my Samsung Captivate Glide. Only issue: trying to chat always results in a force close. Live race results are only a few laps behind, and live audio stays pretty close to the action. Fix the chat and I\'ll make this a 5-star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Downloaded app. wont do anything  dont waste u money
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Not updating on my Casio camando audio is the only thing working
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not android friendly.
reviews.comment: Thanks but no thanks.

reviews.comment: This sucks if it was free it would suck
